job_title: Java backend Developer with MongoDB & AWS Exp
jd: Greetings,My name is Rishav and I'm an IT recruiter at Tanisha Systems Our records show that you are an experienced IT professional with experience in Java backend Developer with MongoDB & AWS Exp. This experience is relevant to one of my current openings. The opening requires good communication skills in addition to the above skills. It is in Plano, TX / Jersey City, NJ -(Day1- 5 days Onsite) Job Type :: Fulltime/ContractJob Title:- Java backend Developer with MongoDB & AWS ExpJob Location:- Plano, TX / Jersey City, NJ -(Day1- 5 days Onsite) Need 11+ Years of Exp and Locals OnlyIn-Person Interview mandatory Job Description:10+ years of overall experience in software engineering7+ years of experience in Java, J2EE programming, Spring Framework and design techniques and web applications/REST APIsVery strong Mongo DB Exp, there would be coding interview.Hands on with version control practices, Continuous Integration tools e.g. JenkinsKnowledge of cloud technologies – AWS, GoogleUnderstanding of relational databases e.g. Oracle, MS Sql ServerExposure to Agile based software development Following MongoDB specific capabilities:Designing and customizing MongoDB applicationsImplementing database updates and migrationDebugging and troubleshooting when issues ariseAnalyzing databases and advising on optimizing performanceUnderstanding of back-up and disaster recovery plansGood to have knowledge of big data platforms e.g., Cassandra, Hadoop, Mark logic etc.
